title: How to Make Crunchy Bacon Coleslaw

steps.headline: Combine the sugar and salad dressing together in a large bowl.
steps.description: Add and thoroughly combine the rest of the ingredients

steps.headline: You want to make sure that the dressing covers all of the shredded cabbage.
Cover the bowl with plastic wrap.
Refrigerate to allow the mixture to chill until ready to use.
Top it with bacon on top and serve.

text: Combine the sugar and salad dressing together in a large bowl. Add and thoroughly combine the rest of the ingredients You want to make sure that the dressing covers all of the shredded cabbage.  Cover the bowl with plastic wrap.  Refrigerate to allow the mixture to chill until ready to use.  Top it with bacon on top and serve.
